title: Hughie Jennings PSA type 1 photo and both hands T206
author: Redleg25

posts.post_title: Hughie Jennings PSA type 1 photo and both hands T206
posts.post_content:
T206 both hands card presents well. Has a tiny crease at bottom that can be seen in light
The photo is 3.5"x4.75". PSA type 1. The photo is close to the likeness of the t206 card, both hands in the hair and right knee kicked high, but I've been told by guys that know alot more about photos than I do, that it is not THE photo the card is based on. Still a cool piece of baseball history and a great image of one of baseballs most animated fellas. Selling as a pair only. $750 shipped, US.  REDUCED  $675
